name: Kyton Shield
text: Whether in your hand or draped around your body, the spiked chain serves as both weapon and shield.
prerequisites: Wis 15, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (spiked chain), Kyton Style, base attack bonus +5, Knowledge (planes) 3 ranks, ki pool class feature.
benefit: When using Kyton Style, you gain a +1 shield bonus to your Armor Class as long as you are wielding a spiked chain. If the spiked chain is magical, add 1/2 its enhancement bonus to this shield bonus. If the spiked chain has the vicious ability, instead add its full enhancement bonus to the shield bonus.
text_zh: 无论在你手中还是围绕自身，刺链既是武器，也是盾牌。
prerequisites_zh: 感知15，擅长异种武器（刺链），链魔流，BAB+5，知识（位面）3级，气池职业能力。
benefit_zh: 当你使用链魔流时，只要你持用刺链，你的AC获得+1盾牌加值。如果刺链是魔法物品，那么把它增强加值的1/2加到盾牌加值上。如果刺链有反噬特性，那么把全部的增强加值加到盾牌加值上。
